mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_table (user_name, user_id, user_pwd, user_email, user_phone, user_type, regdate) VALUES (#{user_name}, #{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_type}, sysdate())

SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(user_idx),0)) as user_idx FROM user_table
INSERT INTO user_addr_table (user_idx, zip_code, main_addr, detail_addr, ex_addr, addr_type) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{zip_code},#{main_addr},#{detail_addr},#{ex_addr}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from user_addr_table where user_idx = #{user_idx} order by addr_type desc
